channel.title: Data Populator
channel.description: A plugin to populate your design mockups with meaningful data. Good Bye Lorem Ipsum. Hello JSON.

item.title: Version 3.5.2
item.description:
• Add support for data properties containing '.' in their name. If your property contains '.', such as imageUrl.2.2 , add backticks (`) around that key. For example, someObject.`property.with.fullstop`
  • We added analytics to the plugin to gather diagnostics and usage data. This will help us identify usage problems and improve the plugin. All data is collected anonymously and cannot be used to identify you. If you want to opt out, just untick the "Privacy" checkbox in the Sketch Settings under "General".

item.title: Version 3.5.0
item.description: • we fixed the most critical issues. Details: https://github.com/preciousforever/data-populator/projects/2

item.title: Version 3.0.3
item.description:
• {placeholders} can now be used in override text content!
  • Data substitutes can now be stacked in order of priority: for example, {name??email?phone} will use 'email if there's no data for 'name' and 'phone' if there's no data for 'email' etc.
  • '#swapSymbol' Conditional Action: if you don't pass a symbol name (eg. #swapSymbol[true]), it will swap the symbol to 'None', hiding the symbol effectively

item.title: Version 3.0.2
item.description:
• Fixed symbols in Sketch 52.3
  • '#swapSymbol' Conditional Action now works with Libraries

item.title: Version 3.0.1
item.description:
• no more crashes when running populate with JSON and the previously selected JSON file no longer exists
  • pressing enter key to select JSON files no longer automatically runs populate (you didn't even get a chance to look at the settings before and it would just populate immediately)
  • it's now possible to use data for substitutes! For example, {something?name} will insert 'name' but {something??name} will use the data for the 'name' key in the data

item.title: Version 3.0.0
item.description:
• Revamped UI
  • New command: Last used data
  • New command: Populate from URL

item.title: Version 2.3.5
item.description: • Fixed compatibility issues for populating images in Sketch 52.

item.title: Version 2.3.4
item.description: • Renamed the plugin from "Sketch Data Populator" to "Data Populator".

item.title: Version 2.3.1
item.description: • Removed all image assets from the plugin bundle for faster internal updates. They're now URLs in the demo JSON.

item.title: Version 2.3.0
item.description: • It is now possible to select the location of your presets library.

item.title: Version 2.2.2
item.description:
• Added support for Sketch 48.
  • Minor bug fixes when configuring grid settings.
